description: The file defines the MessageJavaCodeProducer class, which is responsible for generating Java code related to message definitions, IPC interfaces, clients, and handlers within an IPC (Inter-Process Communication) system. It contains methods for generating various Java source files based on message wrappers and project context.

classes.name: MessageJavaCodeProducer
classes.description: A class responsible for generating Java source code related to IPC messaging, including interfaces, clients, and handlers based on message definitions and project context.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main entry point to generate all necessary IPC Java files based on the context and language mask.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Placeholder method; all messages are combined, so no individual wrapper file is generated.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Placeholder method; all messages are combined, so no wrapper buffer is generated.

methods.name: getIpcCodesInterfaceName
methods.description: Returns the name of the IPC codes interface, either fully qualified or simple based on parameter.

methods.name: createIpcCodeInterface
methods.description: Generates the Java interface for IPC codes based on message dependencies and project context.

methods.name: getIpcClientName
methods.description: Returns the name of the IPC client, either full or simple qualified.

methods.name: createIpcClient
methods.description: Creates the Java IPC client source file based on message wrappers and project context.

methods.name: createIpcServiceHandler
methods.description: Creates the Java IPC service handler source file based on message wrappers and project context.

methods.name: getIpcCodesInterfaceName
methods.description: Constructs the name for the IPC codes interface, considering whether it should be fully qualified.
